thread.title: Robert Harward 'turns down' Trump's national security advisor offer
thread.title_full: Robert Harward 'turns down' Trump's national security advisor offer

title: Robert Harward 'turns down' Trump's national security advisor offer
text:
Robert Harward 'turns down' Trump's national security advisor offer 17 February 2017 Image copyright Reuters Image caption Retired Vice-Admiral Robert Harward is a 60-year-old former Navy Seal US President Donald Trump's choice for National Security Adviser has reportedly turned down the job offer. 
Retired Vice-Admiral Robert Harward was widely tipped for the post after Mr Trump fired Michael Flynn on Monday. 
According to US media, the sticking point was that Mr Harward, a 60-year-old former Navy Seal, wanted to bring in his own team. 
Mr Flynn had misled US Vice-President Mike Pence over his conversations with Russia's ambassador to the US.
